column2: Conduct Schedule and Surprise Visits for 8 branches as per schedule given by HO         Gather market intelligence on MFI business in the area         Maintain a record of Collection quality in the catchment and advice branches of caution areas         Support field teams in difficult cases of collections         Conduct investigation into special situation if need arises             Qualification:    Graduate/ Post Graduate in any discipline

Perform cut off procedures over sales and purchases and subsequent vouching for other income/expense items.     Preparing synopsis of contracts, reports, minutes of meeting of the Board of Directors     Provide necessary support to the team on preliminary risk formalities.     Verify expenses, amount appearing in the books of account with the supporting documents viz. invoices, agreements.     Standardization of processes, documentation, analysis of technical issues and research solutions.     Effectively manage multiple, concurrent projects and meet deadlines.     Work both independently and along with the team         Desired Profile:         Should have cleared AA exam     Full time position     Work from office.

A PLUS Online Tutoring is looking for Accounts Tutor to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Subject-Specific Instruction:Provide individualized instruction to students based on their unique learning needs, strengths, and areas for improvement      Teach concepts, explain theories, and demonstrate problem-solving techniques in the subject area(s) being tutored      Develop and implement customized lesson plans and instructional materials tailored to each student's learning style and pace      Homework Help and Review:Assist students with homework assignments, projects, and exam preparation      Review class materials, textbooks, and study guides to reinforce understanding of key concepts and reinforce classroom learning      Provide guidance and feedback to help students improve their study habits, organization skills, and academic performance      Progress Monitoring and Assessment:Assess students' academic progress, track performance, and identify areas for further development      Administer practice tests, quizzes, and assessments to evaluate students' comprehension and mastery of subject matter      Analyze assessment results and provide constructive feedback to students to help them set and achieve academic goals      Communication and Collaboration:Communicate regularly with students, parents, and guardians to provide updates on student progress, goals, and areas of focus      Collaborate with classroom teachers and school administrators to align tutoring sessions with classroom curriculum and learning objectives      Participate in parent-teacher conferences, student progress meetings, and other educational activities as needed      Professional Development:Stay informed about current trends, best practices, and methodologies in tutoring and education      Participate in ongoing training, workshops, and professional development opportunities to enhance tutoring skills and effectiveness      Seek feedback and self-reflect on tutoring practices to continuously improve teaching techniques and student outcomes

TriGem Solutions is looking for PGT Accountancy to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey       A reputed CBSE residential school is seeking a dynamic and dedicated Higher Secondary Accountancy Teacher to join their enthusiastic team of educators. As a residential CBSE-affiliated school located in Baru Sahib, Himachal Pradesh, they are committed to providing quality education that fosters intellectual and social development in the students.               Requirements              Post Graduate with at least 45% marks                 B.Ed. (preferred)                 Open to relocate                 Expertise in Subject Matter                 Good Language Capabilities             Good classroom management skills             Open to Learning                 Benefits             Accommodation             Handsome Salary
